text: Piwo skonsumowane. Ocena na podstawie retrospekcji w celu uzupe켹nienia profilu.
Bottle. Frothy white good mostly deminishing head. Red colour. Light malty and hoppy powerfull blueberry aroma. Light sweet and powerfull acetic blueberry flavor. Long syruply finish.

Bottle. Light to moderate hay for the malt, dried grass for the hops, dried leaves for the yeast, with notes of berries and proseco in the background. Head is small, fizzy, white, with no lacing and is fully diminishing. Color is murky pale yellow. Flavor starts heavily acidic and sour, then the short finish is moderately acidic, sour and just a touch salty. Palate is light to medium, watery, with a fizzy carbonation and a tart finish. Excellent Gose, nice n sour, a bit salty and well balanced with blueberries.

A 330ml bottle with a best before date of 1st April 2017. Poured into a Lost Abbey teku glass. It was a deep dark purple-ish red colour with a one finger purple-ish pink colour head that dissipated fairly quickly while leaving some sparse lacing. Tart and sour with a Ribena like aroma of blueberry, blackcurrant and grape with hints of grapefruit. Tastes tart and lightly sour. Again like the aroma, the Ribena comes through with blackcurrant, blueberry and grape. There is also hints of salt. Sourness increases towards the end along with acidity. Light bodied with high spritzy carbonation. Overall very refreshing and very easy to drink with nice amount of fruit and tartness.
Bottle 0,33. Pours dark redish with small off-white head. Berries, blueberry, some citrus, nice sourness. Light body and medium cacarbonation.

This is pretty fun. Pretty cool pairing of the lactic yoghurt feeling and blueberry. Made a connection there I wasn뇺 really aware of before. Refreshing and moreish, wish could drink a big jug of this in the summer. Just getting to the end of bottle here, would recommend giving the base a swirl - the dregs are fairly mind blowing. Possibly explains the slightly lacking body for the rest of my bottle as the real lassi lies below....

February 1, 2017. Bottle at home. 

Deep purple with a large frothy pink head. Aroma is tart fruity berries with black currants, light bilberries, some lemon notes, light yoghurt and a slight earthy note. 
Taste is sour dry, berries, light salty. 
Dry, astringent finish with berry skins with mainly black currants, some bilberries, light yoghurt and minerals. 
Nice, a bit too astringent.

330 mL bottle. Pours a murky deep purple (with some really icky purple gunk inside the cap and neck). Smells of intense berries. Like blackcurrant. Hefty lactic aroma, like yogurt. Tastes of blackcurrant, mineral flavor, yogurt. Sharp tartness. Light body. Impressive.

Bottle. Purple with moderate, light red/pink head. Moderate head retention and lacing. Aroma is heavy frozen blueberries, wheat, dough, lightly straw and some lacto. Taste is moderately sweet, lightly acidic, and lightly salty both with moderate duration. Medium body, watery to oily texture, average carbonation, finish is dry, moderately sour, frozen blueberries, lightly mineral and earthy. Summary: Decent brew with domination of frozen raspberries, but with all the gose features. I never know, if the add artificial flavors to the beer or not. Podsumowanie: Pot캧콮ny aromat mro콮onych jag칩d, kt칩re praktycznie zdominowa켹o to piwo. S켹one, kwa콑ne, wytrawne, aromatyczne czu캖 lacto i lakto ;) Warte spr칩bowania, ale nie wiem czy swojej ceny.

0.33 l bottle from 뇍eergium, best before April 2017. Clear, deep bordeaux with a thin, frothy, slowly diminishing, pinkish white head. Slightly sweetish, fruity-herbal aroma of blueberry, lemongrass and some pine. Rather sour, very fruity and a bit herbal-grassy taste of blueberry, elderberry, lemongrass, pine and a touch of tea leaves, followed by a medium long, rather tart, minerally-dry and a little salty finish. Thin to medium body, rather astringent and a bit effervescent mouthfeel, soft carbonation. Quite nice, I dig the idea but I think it뇹 not really what it뇹 supposed to be. It뇹 a refreshing fruited Gose, but what has this to do with a Lassi? It뇹 tasty nevertheless, but like the mango version not really my thing. I guess it totally up to the way it뇹 served, the bottle version is apparently very different than the one from a slushy machine.

Must be one of the best blueberry beers I have had. Nice mellow and easy detectable blueberry flavor.Opaque blue color with a fine purple head. Good intensity in the aroma. Nice body for a beer at 3,5%. Fine carbonation level. Mellow sourness and a fine blueberry profile in the flavor.[Bottle from a trade with Nisse666]

Draught. Dark red coloured. Unclear. Dense reddish head. Aroma. Blueberry, sourness, flowers, sourness. Flavour. Sourness, herbs, blueberry, some vinegar, citrus. Medium to full bodied.Ends sour and full of berries. NIce.

Backlog. Synchronizing with notes and Untappd.
Great milky blueberry sour beer. Loved it!

Bottle. It pours dark reddish with a light pink head. The aroma is fresh blueberries and a nice sour kick. Quite salty flavor with a great sour note. Lots of fresh blueberries. Salty finish. A bit too salty for me but the blueberries are amazing.
Barwa jagodowa, piwo z do콑캖 obfit캔, drobn캔 i r칩콮ow캔 pian캔. W aromacie bor칩wki, lacto, troch캧 soli. W smaku bor칩wki, czerwone owoce, przyjemnie kwa콑ne, mega orze콬wiaj캔ce.
Etched glass bottle from Jacob on spontaneous gose night - pours bluish purple with pink head - nose/taste of fresh blueberry, sea salt, sour lactose, milk sugar - lighter medium body

Pours purple (rain!) with pinkish head. Poor aroma, just a hint of blueberry and a lot of funk. Nice flavour: tart, blueberries, lemon zest, citrus, slight salty, kinda grassy. Watery and so refreshing as a gose should be. Very nice!
Het voldoet aan de definitie van 뇩ier. Maar heeft eerder iets weg van een zure vruchtensap. Niettemin lekker. Mooi zuur.

How: Draught.
Where: All in Beerfest 2016.
Appearance: Hazy pink colour with floating soft ice cream on top.
Aroma: Blueberries, sour, fruit, citrus.
Body: Light to medium body, low carbonation.
Flavour: Blueberries, fruit, citrus, sour.

Draught @ CBC 2016 [ Green Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, Oksnehallen Vesterbro, Halmtorvet 11, 1700 Copenhagen, Denmark. [ As Omnipollo Bianca Blueberry Lassi Gose ].Unclear dark red - purple color with a large, creamy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white - pink head. Aroma is moderate to heavy blueberry, frozen berries, frozen blueberries, frozen - freezer. Flavor is moderate sweet and light acidic with a average duration, blueberries, tart, dough, frozen - freezer. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20160514]
 7-3-7-3-14

Degustacja podczas urodzin Dobrego Zbeera, Piwo przede wszystkim wyr칩콮nia si캧맙woim kolorem. W aromacie wyra콬na kwaskowo콑캖 czerwonych owoc칩w. W smaku podobnie: czerwone owoce: maliny, czerwone porzeczki. Wyra콬na kwasowo콑캖 i taniny. Dobrze pijalne.

Bottle at home. Clear dark ruby with light pinkish head. Sweet and sour berries, salty minerallike base, light pasteurized milk note. Under medium sweet, about medium sour and light salty and bitter. About medium bodied. Very much a berry fruitjuice hardly recognizable as beer. Nice soda pop carbonation and sugary & minerallike soda pop mouthfeel. Very much like cassis but with different berries. Nice fruity tart finish. Very tasty.

UPDATED: OCT 25, 2016 August 2016 - Bottle share at Chriso뇹 Pre-GBBF Shindig, Day 1.  Thanks! As 뇚mnipollo Bianca Blueberry Lassi Gose. Very dark red, hazy, still, foamy pink head.  Aroma is intense blueberry, strawberry, redcurrant.  Body is light, tingly carbonation, smooth.  Taste is redcurrant, blueberry, tangy fruits.  Quite good.  (3.6)

Aroma: Blueberry domination, dark fruits, little salty.
Appearance: Hazy purple with purple/pink head.
Taste: Fruity, blueberries, not too sour, watery, unfortunately one dimensional, there is no wow-effect.
Overall: decent beer, but nothing special, little bit overrated.

Warsaw Beer Festival Oct 16

Many thanks to Nisse666 for this bottle!  Great purple in the glass with a great fruity nose. The beer starts nice dry-sourish, lots of fruity blueberries there. The sourness is intense but fits in well, nice sourish blueberry fruity, the yeast is soft and smooth, the aftertaste is long fruity, nice sourish refreshing with a great fruity berry aroma. Fascinating great aroma profile, smooth and extreme fruity sourness, very great brew! Highly drinkable with lots of depth.

Bottle shared at the chriso and Ruth pre GBBF Shindig 2016 - London. Day 1. Pours a bold red with a creamy, pink head. Lightly sweet, with good tartness, mild acidity, berry skins. Light bodied with average carbonation. Clean and tart in the finish. Good one.
Dark red colour with a pink head. Aroma and flavour of blueberries, malt, tartness, spice, acidic and salt.

Bottle from Beer Gonzo, Earlsdon, Coventry consumed at home, Wednesday 7th September 2016   This pours a striking very vibrant deep red colour actually it might even be beetroot or purple. Tangy, tartness and fruity, with a long dry finish yep this wakes yer mouth up. A6 A5 T7 P3 Ov14 3.5

Pre-GBBF 2016 tasting at Chris&Ruth뇹, Day-1. It pours a rich ruby color with a small pinkish head. Aroma is tangy fruity tart acidic with notes of lemon, blueberry and straw. Taste is also tart sour with more notes of lemon, blueberry, straw. Light to medium bodied with good carbonation. Overall, very nice

6th August 2016The great ChrisO pre GBBF gathering. Hazy purple - mauve beer, thin magenta head! Palate is light and dry, decent carbonation. Sour blueberry and lesser blackberry. Some spice. Tart generic berries. Not bad.
Dyp r칮d noe t친kete med fingerh칮yt rosa skum. Lukter r칮de b칝r, solb칝r og s친 er bl친b칝rene der da. Sur smak, noe syrlig. Sure b칝r og noe sitrus, grapefrukt. Middels lang.

33cl bottle. Hazy dark red color with medium big, rose head. The aroma has strong fruity notes but on the dark sour side. Also some hoppy mango and citruses. It kinda smells like a blueberry yogurt. Quite creamy but watery mouth feel with decent carbonation. The beer is fruity but one dimensional sour with long finish. The sourness isn뇺 overwhelming though. Refreshing.

Flaska fr친n Ica M칬llan, Malm칬. M칬rk r칬dbl친, klar v칛tska med rosavit skumkrona. Ser ut som ett glas druvjuice. N칛r jag h칛ller upp sista slatten 칛r det knappt en tendens till j칛stf칛llning, men i botten p친 flaskan ligger som ett tjockt, m칬rkbl친tt skikt som f칬rsvinner f칬rst n칛r jag sk칬ljt ut flaskan n친gra g친nger. Syrlig och funkigt h칬ig doft som drar 친t svarta vinb칛r, bl친b칛r och n칛stan lite k칬rsb칛r. B친de s칬ta och friskt syrliga toner med stor b칛righet. Kroppen 칛r medelstor 친t det n친got l칛ttare h친llet, med en ganska torr k칛nsla och en syrlighet som f친r kinderna att strama 친t. Smakm칛ssigt en stor syrlighet som 칛ven ger ett litet utrymme 친t det fruktigare b칛rtonerna. Smakar frisk och syrlig svarta vinb칛rssaft och lemonad med tydligt inslag av citronkoncentrat. Bl친b칛r, torkade bl친b칛r, med toner fr친n bl칬tt h칬. Smakar en del som fruktl칛der jag gjorde f칬r l칛ngesen av bl친b칛r, honung och pressad lime. Stor i smaken, s칛rskilt f칬r att vara en folk칬l.
Bottle shared at Chris and Ruth뇹 pre GBBF shindig; dark purple pour with a bubbly pink head, aroma has red fruits, taste has some tart blueberries, lemon juice, quite drying.

Bottle @ home, from ICA. Pours blue with a pink, almost blue head. Dry, acidic aroma with blueberries, salt, red berries, lemon. Medium tart taste with sweet and sour blueberries, lemon juice, lemon zest, grain, salt, coriander. Acidic finish and slight salty finish with red berries and lemon zest lingering. Nice.

BOTTLE. Mulberry in colour with lavender laced head.. Punchy berry nose with an acidic touch at the back.. Berry acidic bitterness slaps the front of the palate, then sweet berries & cream middle going to a sharp tart finish.. Sourced RW
Tap @ CBC2016. Pours dark purple-ish red with a big pink head. Notes of blueberries, black currants, lactic tartness, floral, jammy, sweet. Nice!

330 ml bottle, bb 2017-04-01.
Dark ruby body, with a medium, fluffy, pink head.
Amazing, smooth aroma with loads of blueberries and other sweet-sour berries, citrus candy, some caramel.
Tastes of sour berries, caramel, some citrus, sour apples, some pears.
Light, slick mouthfeel, with an average carbonation.
Finishes medium sour, medium dry, fruity, with pears, apples, berries.

Very nice. The nose is just wonderful, with loads of lovely blueberries. Taste is more typical for the style, fresh and easy. Great style example, with an outstanding aroma.

0,33l bottle shared by 4. BB 01.04.2017. pink / dark redish hazy color, small pink / white head. smells of berries, light pines, a bit sour / citric. nice smell. light body, rather bubbly carbonation, slick mouthfeel. tastes of berries, blueberries, raspberries, lightly sour, salty, citric, ligh resin, light green apples, lightly funky. finishes rather sour, dry and lightly bitter with notes of berries, light salt and citric notes. very nice one, nice sourness, very refreshing. great stuff.

Bottle. Thanks to Werckmeister. Dark red body with pink head. Nice pine and fruity aroma. Taste is sour fruits with blueberries and some malts. Aftertaste is nice sour slightly balanced by some fruity sweetness. Nice.

bottle. Pours intense purple with a violet hue. Very small dark pink head. The aroma is just sublime: intense raspberry, and cassis, blueberries and cranberries. Silky soft body, but all in all a bit bland; the fruitiness is subdued by the saltiness, as is the taste.

Flaska fr친n ICA, M칬llan, Malm칬. Ytterligare en fruktig gose fr친n Omnipollo. Lite tjock, men inte lika tjock som hallonvarianten, v칛tska, M칬rkt lilar칬d, l친gt skum. M칬rk b칛rig smak mun utan tydlig bl친b칛rssmak som ofta 칛r fallet utan lika mycket svarta vinb칛r, bj칬nb칛r mm. Bra balans, frisk, aningen syrlig och fin b칛rig str칛vhet ger karakt칛r. Lite tvist fr친n j칛st salt, aningen laktos. Fin t칬rstsl칛ckare och riktigt gott.

330ml bottle. Darkest purple colour with average, frothy, diminishing, minimally lacing pink head. Earthy, leafy, salty and fruity aroma, notes of blueberry, shrubs, coniferes, pine needles, blueberry ice, blueberry yoghurt. Taste is tart, salty, fruity, notes of blueberry, blackcurrant and grape juice with earthy leafy and earthy herbal embedding, hints of ayran; lively, prickling, refreshing carbonation. Very nice, "countercyclical", earthy instead of tropical fruity variation of the style. Very good!

On tap at Schouskjelleren, april 28th 2016.Purple body with a pink head. Aroma of soap, blueberries, butter, yoghurt. Taste is sweet and sour, berries, milk, cheese and wheat. Lactic finish. I뇴 a fan of the other Bianca Lassi뇹, but this one didn뇺 tikc my boxes.
A really nice beer that I tried with a little beerghurt on top at the Oedipus International Beer Festival with Dave in 2016. Very fruity, light but with a really nice, sharp tart bite at the end.

Bottle from Saveur-Biere.com - Color: deep dark purple blue beer with no carbonation and really small white foam. Smell: red fruits, blueberry and blackcurrant notes. Sourness and astringent. Fruity nose. Taste: light body with fruity sourness. Red fruits and wild red fruits. Blueberry domination with blackcurrant notes. Astringent. Sourness and tart taste. Aftertaste: tart and fruity. Quiet good, even if it뇹 not my style.

Bottle. Pours a cloudy dark red with a thin lacy light pink head. Aroma is of blueberry, some salt, really fruity. Loads more blueberry in the mouth, really refreshing, tart finish. Oily mouthfeel, medium carbonation.
Flaska fr친n ica. Bl친lila med rosa skum. Fruktig doft med syrliga bl친b칛r. Syrlig och l칛tt smak, en del bl친b칛r men v칛ldigt tunn.

Draft at Oedipus fest. Pink color. Aroma of fresh red berries, cream and some tart. Taste has soft creamy berry, fruity sourness, mild salt and fitting tart. Like a great melted tart ice cream. They did it again.

Bottle from ICA 칀kered cons 2016-07-06 G칬teborg
AR: salty crackers ans mashed sour blueberries
AP: thick blueberry juise, blueberry colored lid
F: sour blue erry juice, wee salty biscutes, rich carbonation, bitter, rhubarb?, fruity dry

Draught @ CBC 2016. Pours red with a huge pink head. Aroma of wheat, light sourness, rich fruirty, blueberry. Flavor is light sour, wheat, yeast, salty, rich fruity, blueberries. Medium body, average carbonation. 140516

van de tap op OIBF half vloeibaar, half als slushpuppy. De blauwe bessen voeren de boventoon, maar daarnaast ook karnemelk maar wel op een frisse manier. body is  zeer vol voor het type bier. Wat een genot @3,5% voor mij de verrassing van het festival.

Glass at Oedipus International Beer Festival, served from a slushy machine. Very hazy red purple with a big pink purple head. Aroma of massive fresh blueberry smoothie. Light sweet and moderate sour. Light to light medium bodied with light carbonation.
From tap at Oedipus International Beer Festival 2016. Aroma is tart fruits, blueberries, sour berries. Flavour is nicely medium sour and tart. Body is light to medium. Wonderful sour berries gose.
CBC. Deep red/ruby with big lasting pink head. Aroma is malt, blueberries and desert. Flavour is malt, blueberries, little sour, citric, little dry, little sweet and berries .
Bottle. Pours a deep red color with a small off-white head. Has a fruity dusty berry aroma. Fruity sour tart bitter blueberry flavor. Has a fruity sour tart blueberry finish.

duft: bl친rb칝r s칮d frugtig fugt r칮d 
smag r칮d b칝r sur solb칝r bl친b칝r t칮r lang eftersmag
Bottle sample at Chmielarnia. Strong aroma of sweet blueberry. Taste is medium sour, very fruity and lactic.

Draught @ CBC 2016, Green session, K칮benhavn
Pours dark purple with a purple head. Aroma has notes of malt, lactose, tartness and blueberry. Taste is light to medium sweet, light bitter and light sour with a long blueberry, tart and light salty finish. Body is medium, texture is thin to oily, carbonation is soft.
From tap at Banksia. Dark red colour with a pink head. Aroma and flavour of blueberries, malt, tartness, spice, acidic and salt.
Heard great things, but a let down. Thin mouthfeel, not much sourness and not much blueberry either!

Bottle. Pours unclear deep red with a purple head. Aroma of fresh blueberries from the Bush, floral hops, red currants, black currants, lactic tartness and vinous berry notes. The taste is tart and fruity with lots of blueberry and red/black currants. Also some berry bitterness and weak salt. Good!

21/V/16 - 33cl bottle from Bierhalle Deconinck (Vichte) @ Erwin뇹 Ponton Tasting - BB: 1/IV/17 (2016-612) Thanks to ElManana+1 for sharing the bottle!
Clear dark ruby red to purple beer, creamy dense off-white to pink head, unstable, dissipates quickly, non adhesive. aroma: pretty dirty, some blueberries, bit soapy, sulphur. MF: soft carbon, medium to light body. Taste: sour start, bit lemony, salty touch, very dry and bitter, lots of tannins. Aftertaste: sourish, weird, tannins, bitter, more tannins, unpleasant. Nope, this is not my thing.
Sample @ CBC16, Copenhagen. Green session. Deep purple pour with soft served pale head. Tons of blueberry soup, some funk, light grainy and some light vanilla. Juicy!

Fruity blueberry prominent, berry fruit, grassy hoppy, pinch of salt, berry fruity finish.
Bottle. Tart with a dry finish and high fruitiness. Nice and round body for a 3.5abv beer.
Flaska fr친n ICA. Smak och doft av bl친b칛r, lactos, vete, jord med toner av sl친nb칛r och bj칬rnb칛r. Fruktig, frisk och funkig, viss syrlighet, lagom s칬tma, fin beska. Gott!

Bottled. Pours hazy rdeep purple with an average pink head. Aroma of citrus, lemon zest and blueberries.Slightly sweet flavor that ends up being dry and tart. Light bodied, watery to oily texture. A very nice Gose. 游游游游

330ml bottle @ Buxton Tap House, Buxton. Pours deep reddish purple, pink head. Berry fruit in the aroma. Taste is not quite as blueberry-y as expected, more red berry / raspberry fruit. Sticky lactic finish. It뇹 nice, just not quite as I hoped.
CBC. Hazy deep red with a huge and lasting pink head. Aroma is sweet, malty, blueberries and tart. Flavor is medium sweet and light acidic. Dry and light acidic finish with a hint of salt. 140516

33cl bottle, served in snifter glass. Poured a deep, murky smoothie-like redviolet with a one finger pink head. Aromas of blueberries, light tartness, some funk. Taste: Blueberries, cherries, citrus, tart. Initially tastes sweet, but quickly replaced by tartness and finally dryness. Light to medium body. Soft carbonation. My first gose and I뇴 not disappointed. Very good brew!

[email맗rotected]/* <![CDATA[ */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* ]]> */ Pours deep red with a good pink head. Aroma and taste is malt, berries, fruits, hops, light citrus, blueberries. Very fresh. Medium body. Soft carbonation. Mild sour fruity finish.

[5/11/16] Draught at Banksia in Copenhagen. Beautiful purple color with a creamy pink head. Aroma of blueberry yogurt. Tart flavor, lactic, with lots of blueberries, and a lemony note. Medium-bodied. Great.

Bottle from some neighbourhood food store.
Murky dark pinkish red with a 2 finger pink head. Bottle print (a feather) is one of the most stylish and tasteful ones Karl Grandin has done for Omnipollo. Very good looking beer.
Aroma is blueberry juice with a pinch of gooseberries and grapefruit plus lactose. Sweet, fruity and tart at the same time.
Taste is the same intense fruitiness with tart blueberries, lemon and gooseberries. Faint sweetness that quickly goes tart and dry.
Medium bodied, soft carbonation, slightly thick texture.
Think I liked the raspberry version better, but still, nice beer for its abv.
Bottle at Erwin's place. Gorgeous colour. Very fruity, sweetish ans very light salt. Very good stuff.
Keg at cbc16... Deep red.. Large pink head.. Soft dusty earthy fruit nose.. Juicy tart fruit.. Soft blueberries.. Light tart fruit
Tap @CBC16. Hazy, murky red, huge fluffy slush ice head. Blueberry and raspberry aroma. Similar flavour, but the ice topping is slightly disturbing.

From tap at Banksia, Copenhagen. Hazy ruby red color with pink head. Yeasty aroma, tart fruity, berries raspberries - blueberries, light funky. Light sweet and acidic taste like aroma. Light to medium oily body with soft carbonation

(33 cl bottle in wine glass.) Pours like an enchanted ruby elixir with a thin bright head that fades rather quickly. The mouthfeel is very alive and fresh with tastes of wild strawberries and blue ones, but really it is the aroma that blows you away.
Bottle. Deep red with a large pink head. Soft, mild sour, saltyness, some sweetness, berries, very drinkable, mild sour and salty finish.
CBC2016. Sehr tr칲bes r칬tlich pinkes Bier mit einer sehr sch칬nen pinken Schaumkrone. Geruch s칛uerlich, rote Beeren. Geschmack gering s칛uerlich, rote waldbeeren, Vanille, lecker.
Keg. Deep red with a large pink head. Soft, mild sour, some sweetness, berries, easy drinking, mild sour finish. Fresh.
Tap at CBC2016, Copenhagen. Colour is deep red with small white head. Aromas and flavors: Berries, blueberries, some sourness and sweetness.
Tap@ CBC 2016. Pours red/pinkish color, pink fluffy head. Blueberry cake, mild sweetness, sourness. Flavor has blueberry milkshake, tartness, berries. Soft. Gotta give full points to the looks here.

Bottle from Hemk칬p 160514. 
Pink purple body with bluish pink lacing head. Beautiful. Not so pleasant nose. Very fresh and nice taste on the other hand. Lactid sourness with rich blueberries. 


---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap @ CBC -16. Reddish pink with a lump of pink slush / medium pinkish head. fruity aroma with cherries and blueberries. ice cream and lacto. taste is light sour and fruity. loads of berry flavors here. mostly cherry nd bluberroes. light bodied and softly carbonated

14.05.2016, tap @ CBC:
Big pink creamy longlasting head, nice deep reddish color. Aroma is slightly dry fruity, blueberry, winegum, grass, hops, weeds, sorrel, soda powder, hints of saltwater. Taste is sour-ish dry, sour red berries, sorrel, berry skin, pine needles, hops, bark, moss, saltwater. Medium bitterness, dry acidic mouthfeel. Nice.

Aroma of blueberry, salt, berries, sweet milk. 
Pours deep red with a purple / pink one finger head. 
Taste is medium to highly sour, medium to lightly sweet. 
Medium body, slightly creamy mouthfeel, soft carbonation, sour blueberry finish. Overall a bit more balanced than the raspberry version. 
Impressing.

Pour that beautifull blueberru deep ruby, with a small pink head. 
Aroma has some sweet blueberries, vanilla, almonds, blueberry pie, slight lemon peel. 
Taste is quite dessert like sweet, with some Nice and balancing sour notes to it. 
Medium bodied, with a rather flat carbonation. 
I like rather this

Pours deep pinkish purple with a light pink head. Aromas are blueberry muffin or blueberry pie - very dessert like non the less with a light citrus twist. Taste is mineral and sour initially with perfumy blueberries and citric tartness. Light and tingly mouthfeel and a lasting sour and drying aftertaste.

Thnx to phille. Pours very dark purple, Pink, good head. Smell is dry , mild fruityness. Taste is Sharp, mild sour. Blueberry on top but not very blended in. Dry, sweet , fruity aftertaste. Wattery, in a way. Rather low carbo
backlog. Bright cloudy pink. Aroma is lacto, blueberries, hints of yogurt. Mouthfeel is nice for the abv, not as overpowering on the lacto as other lasse췂s. Very nice low abv sour.
Draft. A hazy red beer with a pink head. The aroma has notes of blueberries, wheat, and lacto. The flavor is acidic with notes of lacto, blueberries, and straw, leading to s tart finish.
From tap. Pours hazy dark purple and pink head. Aroma is mild farty blueberry. Dry, citric and blueberry fruity. Slight herbal. Dry, citric and fruity. Dry and slight citric finish.

Bottle from Ica Maxi Lindhagen.
Pours dark red with a pink head.
Aroma of blueberries and vanilla.
Drinkable and balanced tartness and fruitiness, lots of blueberries, yet a feel that it is a beer.
Bottle from ICA Maxi Eurostop outside of 칐rebro. Fruity smell with blueberries. Similar taste, light tart with allot of blueberries. Refreshing.
Bottle at home. Pours deep purple, nose is light blueberry, funky, milky, taste is dry, tart, fruity, thin, salty.

Tap. Buxton Tap. Pale, hazy gold. Film of white. Nose has blueberry. Some milky, cheesecake notes. Fruity, floral hop. Taste is flowery, herby bitter. Some milky sweetness. Soft, background tartness. Creamy mouthfeel. Bitter, slightly astringent finish, mixed with that lactic thing. Not for me.

33cl bottle from saveur-biere.com. Lovely dark red bordeaux color. Head is thin and rose red. Taste is medium high sour. Medium bitterness. Body is medium, finish is long and tart. Aroma is blueberries, raspberries, cherries, milk, barnyard, citric. This is very nice as the other omnipollo biancas.

On tap at Scouskjelleren. Purple color- good foam. Medium aroma intensity; blueberry!, fruity. Medium body & complexity. A little salty, good bitterness & balance. Enjoyable

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle. Hazy deep ruby red beer with a small pink head. Aroma is fruity with notes of red berries, bilberries, chutney, seawater and herbs. Flavor is sour with notes of bilberries, blueberries, chutney, bread and red berries. Well balanced.

33cl bottle at home. From online web order. Poured an intense deep Ruby purple colour with a purple head on top. Nose of tart lemon juice, yoghurt, lactose, tart blueberries, blueberry juice, bitter skin, wheat, salt, sour red grapes. More tartness from the blueberries compared to the raspberry version. Very tasty and refreshing brew

Dark, crimson color with pink head, looks gorgeous. Aroma is straight-up blueberry yogurt. Fruity, slightly sweet and lactic. Taste starts tart up-front with lots of blueberries. Finishes fruity and acidic. Medium, soft body with just the right amount of carbonation. Another great gose from Omnipollo. Tart, extremely fruity, great looks, nice mouthfeel and it has the extra yogurt feel from the lactose.

33cl bottle. Dark ruby pour with a medium height pink head. Blueberries, grapefruit, sour cherries, yogurt, unripe mango and a ton of fruit sourness, tobacco (the taste it leaves in your mouth after you smoke a lot), followed by lactic acid and a hint of farmhouse funk. Sour aftertaste, full of fruit. Quite refreshing. Did I say it뇹 sour as hell?

(330ml bottle @ VilleValla Pub, Link칬ping, Apr 22 2016) Pours pretty dark purple-blue and nearly opaque with a moderate dark pink head. Aroma of lemon juice, blueberry skin, some berry flesh, lactic yoghurt notes. Flavour has blueberry flesh, some red grape and mixed berries, drying tannic skins, lemon, tart bordering on sour, a bit of saltiness, juicy, berries lingering in the aftertaste. Light to medium bodied, average carbonation, quite refreshing stuff. A bit less bright and fruit forward than the others in the series, maybe just the character of the berries, more sour. Still quite tasty.
Bottle from ica ettan v칛ster친s .blue 1-2 finger head mildly souer mildly sweet smell like blueberry sugger mach

330 ml bottle. BB 2017/04/01. (ICA) Stockholm, Sweden.
Dark red color with a small red head.
Yeast, dark berries, some lactic acidity, berry juice and mild Mikkeller notes in the aroma. 
The flavor is tartness, dark berries, mild lemon notes, berry juice, dryness and mild sourness. It's well done but it's just not my thing.

Draught at Omnipollo Tap Takeover at Brewers Beer Bar during Gbg Beer Week 2016. Hazy purple beer with a decent offwhite/pinkish head. Fruity blueberry aroma, grapes, bready, citrus, some raspberries. Fresh blueberry flavor, sourish, raspberry notes, grapes, some citrus. Fresh and drinkable.

Aroma is blueberry and cream. Nice dark red to purple colour with dissipating thin foam. Taste has acidity and distinct blueberry notes lacking a bit in overall character as from the low alcohol level, aftertaste is slightly salty and chalky,and the berrylike acidity also remains pleasantly.

Draught @ Brewdog Helsinki. Pours dark pinkish red with a large light red head. Aroma of tart blueberries, juicy notes, hints of lactic sourness, vanilla and milkshake notes. Taste is smooth, sourish and heavy with blueberry juice notes, tartness, lactic notes and hints of berries. Finish is tartish, juicy and heavy with blueberries, hints of lactic sourness and salty notes. Pretty tasty and quite unique, but perhaps slightly more unbalanced than the other Biancas.

I liked the raspberry version a lot, and this one is very good too, but unfortunately has some phenols (?) / burnt rubber in the aroma. I don뇺 find this note unpleasant, but it doesn뇺 fit the style of this beer. Other from that aroma is nice, like a blueberry smoothie. Taste is still great: blueberries with youghurt (maybe a bit less sour this time, and berries are a bit more prominent) plus a mineral note.

Ta칬@brewdog hki. Dark red bluish color, blueberry, red currant juicew extract coliured. Some bugsyness, funks on nose, dried berries, forest berries, wheat straw. Pink wonder. Crisp, a bit sour. Refreshing. Sweet. Berry. Some spices. Wonderfully hopped.

Bottle sample at V칛xj칬 칐lfestival. Deep blueish with purple head. Aroma is slight tart, blueberries, various funky notes and lemony lactic aroma. Taste is fruity as hell, blueberries, tart lactic blueberries and vague funky notes that i like a lot. Big mouthfeel considering the lactic and low abv

Bottle bought @ Ica 칀kered at about the price of 6 cans of Norrlands Guld 3.5%. Pours hazy bluish red with a small creamy bluish white head that leaves plenty of sticky lacing and trace on the glass while dissipating. Smell is fruity with crackers, lemon juice, blueberries/bilberries, mango, yoghurt, clotted cream, butter, moist grass, minerals and lemon zest. Taste is sour, tiny bitter, slightly salty, fruity and tiny grassy. Mouthfeel is soft, slightly dry, tart, slightly berry skin astringent and light to medium bodied. Finish is sour and salty with lemon juice, bilberries, mango, yoghurt and grass. Nice fruited gose with lots of lactic acid character, blueberries/bilberries and hops. Light hints of butter I don뇺 like but overall good.

Taste is dry and light to medium sour with notes of blueberries, lemon, apples, grain and earth. Light to medium bodied with medium carbonation. Nice.

On tap at Omnipollos Hatt. 

Reddish/pink with a pink head. Aroma and taste of funk, blueberries, light citrus and some hints of butter. Soft and refreshing with a medium tart finish.

Tap at Omnipollos Hatt. Pours reddish purple with off pinkish white head (and soft serve on top). Aroma and taste of sourish blueberry, funk and citrus. Full of fruity flavor and slightly tar finish.

Pours an intense blueish red with a medium frothy red head. Aromas of blueberry, funk, citrus. Taste is very fruity with some lactose sweetness and slight funky notes. Mouthfeel is tart yet creamy with medium carbonation.
